net.neto_framework.server.event

Class ServerEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.neto_framework.server.event.ServerEventListener

  • public abstract class ServerEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that allows actions to be taken when specified events are called on the server.
    Author:
    BleedObsidian (Jesse Prescott)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ServerEventListener()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onServerClientConnect(ServerClientConnect event)
      Fired when a new client successfully connects to the server.
      void onServerFailedToAcceptConnection(ServerFailedToAcceptConnection event)
      Fired when the server fails to accept a TCP or UDP connection.
      void onServerInvalidPacket(ServerInvalidPacket event)
      Fired when the server receives an invalid packet id or packet.
      void onServerPacketException(ServerPacketException event)
      Fired when the server has a problem receiving or sending a packet.
      void onServerReceiveInvalidHandshake(ServerReceiveInvalidHandshake event)
      Fired when the server received invalid data in the handshake packet.
      void onServerStart(ServerStart event)
      Fired when the server starts.
      void onServerStop(ServerStop event)
      Fired when the server stops.
